org.agreement_technologies.service.map_planner

Class POPIncrementalPlan

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agreement_technologies.service.map_planner.POPIncrementalPlan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HPlan, IPlan, Plan

    public class POPIncrementalPlan
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPlan
    Incremental plans for the external search tree; each plan stores a new action w.r.t. its father.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.agreement_technologies.common.map_planner.Plan

        CoDMAP_CENTRALIZED, CoDMAP_DISTRIBUTED, INITIAL, REGULAR, UNASSIGNED

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> computeState(int[] totalOrder,
                                                                PlannerFactory pf)
        Computes the resulting frontier state after the plan execution. This method is used in centralized problems.
        Specified by:
        computeState in interface HPlan
        Parameters:

        pf - Planner factory
        Returns:

      • computeMultiState

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> computeMultiState(int[] totalOrder,
                                                                                          PlannerFactory pf)
        Computes the resulting frontier state after the plan execution. This method is used in distributed problems.
        Specified by:
        computeMultiState in interface HPlan
        Parameters:
        totalOrder - Indexes of the plan steps sorted in a topological order
        pf - Planner factory
        Returns:
        Frontier multi-state. It is a multi-state as this structure allows to store several values for each variable

      • computeCodeState

        public int[] computeCodeState(int[] totalOrder,
                     int numVars)
        Computes the resulting frontier state after the plan execution. This method is used in centralized problems, and works with indexes instead of variables and values names.
        Specified by:
        computeCodeState in interface HPlan
        Parameters:
        totalOrder - Indexes of the plan steps sorted in a topological order
        numVars - Number of (non-numeric) variables in the state
        Returns:
        State. For each variable, this array stores the index of its value
        Since:
        1.0
